pages.text: A misting who burns $(thing)nicrosil$() is known as a "$(thing)Nicroburst$()".$(br)A nicroburst can empower the allomancy of another with physical contact, as if the target were burning duralumin themselves. This can be used to throw other allomancers off, such as giving a coinshot a particularly strong steelpush when they don't expect it. Nicrosil is the external pushing metal and one of four enhancement metals (alongside Aluminum, Chromium, and Duralumin)
